Question: In January 2002, this person's daughter Carrie died of lung and brain cancer at the age of 38.
Hints: That same year, this person's father died of causes related to his alcoholism.
This person starred in a few films while her variety show was running, including Pete 'n' Tillie (1972).
This person reprised her role as Grubbs in September 2011 as part of the series' finale.
